初始化项目:
cd /Users/weizhenchang/Code/web3-practice/solidity/denglian/foundry
forge init hello_foundry --no-git

安装依赖:
cd hello_foundry
forge install foundry-rs/forge-std --no-git

sepolia测试网部署合约:
    forge script script/MyToken.s.sol --rpc-url sepolia --private-key $PRIVATE_KEY --broadcast

本地测试网部署合约:
    forge script script/MyToken.s.sol --rpc-url local --private-key $LOCAL_PRIVATE_KEY --broadcast
    Hash: 0xfcfd042c47e83d816236bcca87bd4cf057438c751d82676069f1b9c9fafa1abd
    Contract Address: 0x9fE46736679d2D9a65F0992F2272dE9f3c7fa6e0

根据合约名生成对应的abi json文件
    forge inspect MyToken abi --json >> MyToken.json

验证合约:
forge verify-contract \
    --chain-id 11155111 \
    --num-of-optimizations 200 \
    --compiler-version v0.8.25 \
    --constructor-args  \
    --etherscan-api-key $ETHERSCAN_API_KEY \
    --watch \
    0x4480D09effF48eD25Cf567E5561522C5B92b7b8f \
    src/MyToken.sol:MyToken
